Producer: Michael Wimer, Roland Emmerich, Mark Gordon
Production Co: Moonlighting Films, Legendary Pictures, Namibia Film Commission, Centropolis Entertainment, Warner Bros.
Synopsis: Mammoth hunter D'Leh (Steven Strait) has long been in love with a beautiful, blue-eyed tribeswoman named Evolet (Camilla Belle). After horseback-riding raiders kidnap most of his D'Leh's fellow tribesmen as well as Evolet, he sets out on a dangerous trek to rescue her from her captors.
Title: 10,000 B.C.
